name: BlissfulWind
0:
”Alexa, open blissful wind”
”Alexa, start blissful wind”
”Alexa, launch blissful wind”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blissful wind
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with the sound of wind entering your room. 
This simple to use app plays a continuous high quality wind sound for as long as you like. 
Create the perfect ambiance for sleep, work, study, meditation, and soothing baby. 

Just simply say “Alexa, open Blissful Wind”
To stop just say “Alexa, Stop”
To pause just say “Alexa, Pause”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
